## Menu.render() method

Creates the menu DOM.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
render(container: Element): HTMLDivElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  container | Element | Element upon which to append this menu. |

<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLDivElement

The menu's root DOM element.
